welcomePage.title: Costrict
welcomePage.subtitle: AI-Powered Strict Coding Assistant for Enterprises
welcomePage.tips1: 1. Select functions, code blocks, and multiple files
welcomePage.tips2: 2. Right-click the mouse, locate Costrict > Code Review, and trigger it with one click

codebase.syncTips: The codebase index synchronization feature is disabled, and code review cannot be run. Do you want to enable codebase index synchronization and continue code review?
codebase.running: Code index building in progress, Code Review will start soon {{progress}}%
codebase.failed: The codebase index building failed, and code review cannot be performed. Please go to <settingsLink>Settings > Context > Codebase</settingsLink> module to check the failure reason and try again.
codebase.success: Code index building success, start Code Review

codeReviewContent.confidenceTooltip: The higher the confidence, the higher the credibility of the problem, the fewer the problems that meet the conditions, and vice versa, it is recommended to take moderate

taskStatusBar.completed: Code quality is excellent, no issues found

tips: If the number of code lines changes, the identification of problematic lines may become inaccurate.
